output: On November 17, 2024, Sport Recife and Ponte Preta faced off at Estádio Moisés Lucarelli in Campinas, São Paulo during Serie B's Regular Season - Round 37. The match resulted in a decisive victory for Sport Recife with a final score of 4-0 against Ponte Preta. Chrystian Barletta from Sport Recife scored two goals and assisted another one before being substituted at the 61' mark, while Felipe also contributed to his team’searly success by scoring in extra time as well. During the match, several substitutions were made on both sides; Ponte Preta had four changes with Igor Inocencio making multiple entries and exits from the field of play. Notably, Sport Recife's F. Domínguez received a red card at the 24', while two yellow cards occurred for players Iago Inocencio and Hudson on behalf of Ponte Preta respectively in different substitution periods throughout the game. The match concluded after full-time with no additional penalties, finishing early due to Sport Recife's substantial lead as indicated by the status 'Match Finished'.
